items.title: The Physics of the Northern Lights
bullets: • The aurora borealis is usually visible only way up north, but over the past 18 months, shimmering curtains of pink and green light have filled night skies across much of North America, at times offering dazzling displays as far south as Texas and Hawaii
• The strength of these is down to the sun reaching the peak of its solar cycle, a period of increased solar storms every 11 years

items.title: Apple launches a Digital ID and says it’ll be accepted by the TSA

• You can present your Digital ID in place of a REAL ID at TSA checkpoints using your iPhone or Apple Watch
